inputs.selection_motivation: Medical Digital Twins enable high-fidelity simulation of patient physiology, accelerating drug discovery and personalized treatment in virology and bacteriology, thereby driving market growth and innovation.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Medical Digital Twins sit at the crossroads of healthcare, AI, and digital modeling, so topics that involve AI infrastructure, digital twin technology, disease modeling, or vaccine-related public health concerns are likely to be strong influences, correlates, or peers.

proposed_link.motivation: Medical Digital Twins enable high-fidelity simulation of patient physiology, accelerating drug discovery and personalized treatment in virology and bacteriology, thereby driving market growth and innovation.
